combo: Hayes Hunter + World Champ Joe Once per battle, Joe may cancel one opponent's destiny just drawn.

front.gametext: When in battle, adds 1 to each of your battle destiny draws. Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots (or 4 to power and 3 to maneuver if Hunter's Custom SUIT). Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Dork Lard of the Sloth. Servant of Emperor's. Encased in armor with cybernetic life support. Student of Decipher. Was the best starpilot in the galaxy. Cunning warrior.
